   CSE
   MNNIT Allahabad
*/
using namespace std;
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define S(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define S2(x,y) scanf("%d%d",&x,&y)
#define C1(x) cin>>x
#define C2(x,y) cin>>x>>y
#define wl(n) while(n--)
#define fl(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
#define P(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define PS(x) printf("%d ",x)
#define P2(x,y) printf("%d %d\n",x,y)
#define vecsiz(c) (c.end()-c.begin())
#define all(c) c.begin(),c.end()
#define yes cout<<"YES"<<endl
#define no cout<<"NO"<<endl
#define nl cout<<endl
#define FR first
#define SE second
#define LL long long int
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define ii pair<int,int>
#define iii pair<int,ii>
#define vi vector<int> 
#define vii vector<ii>
#define MOD 1000000007
#define SIZE 100000
LL pow1(LL a,LL b)
{
    if(b==0)
    return 1LL;
    if(b==1)
    return a;
    if(b%2==1)
    return a*pow1(a*a,b/2);
    return pow1(a*a,b/2);
}
int main()
{
	int t;
	S(t);
	wl(t)
	{
		LL s,e,x,y;
		cin>>s>>e;
		int n,i;
		S(n);
		bool flag=true;
		fl(i,0,n)
		{
			cin>>x>>y;
			if(x>=s&&x<e)
				flag=false;
			else if(s>=x&&s<y)
				flag=false;
		}
		if(flag)
			yes;
		else
			no;
	}
	return 0;
}
